Name: budget_limit
Description: The project's spent budget must not exceed the allocated budget.

Name: team_size_constraint
Description: Team size must be within a specific range (e.g.

Name: sprint_effort_capacity
Description: The sum of effort for all tasks in a sprint must not exceed the team's velocity.

Name: skill_requirement
Description: A worker assigned to a task must possess the required skill.

Name: task_dependency
Description: A task cannot be started if its predecessor task is not complete.

Name: blocker_active
Description: A task with an active blocker cannot have the status 'done'.

Name: mandatory_scrum_master
Description: Every team must be assigned exactly one Scrum Master.

Name: sprint_date_fixed
Description: The start and end dates of a sprint cannot overlap with another sprint for the same team.

Name: single_team_per_sprint_backlog
Description: A sprint backlog must belong to exactly one sprint and one team.

Name: mandatory_product_owner
Description: Every project must have a Product Owner managing its backlog.

Name: release_date_precedence
Description: The planned date for a release must be after the end date of all associated sprints.

Name: epic_story_link
Description: Every user story must belong to an epic.
